name: MuslimPrayer
0:
”Alexa, ask Muslim prayer to start azan”
”Alexa, Open Muslim prayer and start azan fajr”
”Alexa, open muslim prayer and play music”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: muslim prayer
des: Enhance your prayer routine with the Muslim ICCE Azan App for Alexa. This skill accurately determines prayer times for your location and automatically plays the azan when each prayer time enters. Simply enable the skill, set your location, and rely on your Alexa device to remind you of each prayer. Focus on your worship, knowing that the Muslim ICCE Azan App will keep you on track throughout the day
